Description: Painted wooden shabti of Wabet, with black tripartite wig, ends of lappets red and yellow stripes, red and yellow stripe collar with outer black (originally blue) stripe and red border, black (originally blue) sash either side of frontal red-bordered yellow background vertical line of black hieroglyphs identifying deceased as lady of the house and chantress of Amun, rest of body painted white.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
